text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Jan.-March: "hoax!"

3/9: Just like flu.

3/10: "We’re prepared…it'll go away. Stay calm. It will go away.”

3/12: "It’s going to go away."

3/17: Oh shit. How many could die? Tens of thousands? Fuck! I could lose the election.

4/18: Deep state!

#COVID19 US Body Count: 36,773. https://t.co/Izc1vBghjd
